column2: The backbone of every medieval society: Hardy, simple folks living a frugal life, working hard to feed the rest of the population.\nEach pop consumes: §Y1§! Food / §Y0.5§! Clothing / §Y1§! Materials / §F0§! Luxuries\nEach pop provides: §Y1§! Simple Labour / §F0§! Craftsmanship
